manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade Your Sitting Experience with the Everlasting Comfort Seat Cushion The ergonomic design of our versatile butt cushion uses heat responsive technology to provide ideal support, without ever flattening. It's made with premium memory foam and is a great addition to any home office, desk chair or while traveling to give you the comfort you need when you want it.

Previous page Office Chair Cushion Made with 30% more memory foam, our coccyx cushion makes sitting for 8+ hours comfortable Coccyx Seat Cushion Featuring our signature ComfortFoam to withstand up to 400lbs without flattening or losing shape Desk Chair Cushion The office chair cushion helps to relieve pain and discomfort in the lower back, legs, and tailbone Ergonomic Cushion Ergonomically designed pressure relief seat cushion lifts the tailbone over hard seating surfaces Cushion for Chair Works great as a computer chair cushion, gaming chair seat cushion, car seat and airplane cushion Next page See why our tailbone cushion is the answer to your prolonged sitting pain and discomfort 1 All-Day Comfort 2 Premium Memory Foam 3 Low Body Pain Relief 4 Coccyx Cutout 5 Versatile & Portable

Feel the Difference With Our Coccyx Cushion The cushion features an ultra soft cover with a non slip bottom, that’s machine washable. It cushions even the roughest of surfaces such as office chairs, plastic chairs, stadium and airline seats. Start living comfortably and relax in luxury with the Everlasting Comfort Memory Foam Seat Cushion.

High Quality, Responsibly Made Pressure Relief Cushion We have used only the highest quality materials in our tailbone pain relief cushion. Each component has been lab tested and certified safe earning the coveted STANDARD 100 label by OEKO-TEX.

Don't Take Our Word For It, See What Customers Are Saying About Our Butt Pillow Thousands of customers have enjoyed the many benefits of our desk chair cushion, and you can too! It's been touted as the perfect cushion while working, as being very comfortable, helpful for lower back pain, and perfect for sitting while at home or in the car.

Check Out Other Products By Everlasting Comfort Reduce Back Pain Add to Cart Rest Your Feet In Luxury Add to Cart Seat Cool & Comfortable Add to Cart Lower Body Support Add to Cart Drive In Total Comfort Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 34,813 4.6 out of 5 stars 26,829 4.4 out of 5 stars 131,817 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,883 4.3 out of 5 stars 18,357 Price $27.99$27.99 $39.99$39.99 $49.99$49.99 $26.99$26.99 $34.99$34.99 Material Memory Foam Memory Foam Gel Infused Memory Foam Memory Foam Memory Foam Features Dual adjustable straps Doubles as a foot rocker Cooling ventilation holes Removable cushion insert U-shaped coccyx cutout Ideal For Upper, middle, lower back Feet, legs, lower back Tailbone, lower back, legs Tailbone, injury, surgery Tailbone, lower back, legs Dimensions 13”x4”13” 17”x5”x10” 17”x14”x2” 16”x13”x3” 17”x13”x3” Machine Washable ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔

What are the benefits of using a seat cushion? Sitting for long periods of time can cause discomfort in the back, hips, and coccyx. Without proper cushioning, that discomfort becomes more agitated. Adding a chair pad to your office accessories lineup helps take the pressure off your lower body. Does the seat cushion help with tailbone pain? A chair that lacks proper support creates excess pressure on your back, tailbone, and hips. Adding an ergonomic seat cushion lifts your tailbone above hard seating surfaces so sitting is more comfortable for 8+ hours while you work, study, or travel. What sets this seat cushion apart from all the others? Made with our high density ComfortFoam with AdaptivTemp Tech that expertly distributes body weight to relieve pressure without ever flattening, comes with a breathable, washable cover, and is made with high quality, certified safe materials. How to use this seat cushion? Place the seat cushion on any chair with the Everlasting Comfort logo at the front and the U-shaped coccyx cutout at the back. Is this seat cushion washable? Yes. Simply unzip and remove the cover and machine wash. Tumble dry with low or no heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Back Posture
reviews.reviewText: as a successful patient of a lower back disc fusion and some other complications currently being battled due to poor sitting posture, this cushion and lumbar support have greatly helped me and made sitting in my office chair much more tolerable with less effects of poor posture. Well designed and very comfortable. Very glad I bought the set. Packaging and delivery all well done and timely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my tailbone
reviews.reviewText: It’s important to understand from the start that if you suffer from back pain, this will help but it is NOT an immediate fix.Pros: Thick quality padding, no “funny smells,” matches black office chairs, comfortable to sit it for a full 8-12 hour shift, does not make you sweaty.Cons: Not wide enough to cover entire buttocks area (I’m a size 18), need to re-center the pillow every time I sit down again.Experience: I suffered a great deal of tailbone discomfort and pain from sitting hours a day in an office chair with nearly no padding. I did not have enough money to buy a new chair, I’m trying to be frugal. After 2 and a half weeks of using this product with my office chair, my back/tailbone pain was completely gone. It does exactly what it needs to do and takes the weight off your tailbone and back.Sometimes, I have to shoo the cat off it because she finds it comforting too. I’m considering buying another for my cat. She is a “princess” and likes to sit on the finest quality products only. I could probably fix the re-centering issue with some double-sided tape or Velcro.Quick Summary: Worth the money, great quality, not a fast-fix for your back pain but helps greatly in the long-term.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not soft at all
reviews.reviewText: Well, this cushion is definitely a cushion. It is well built, holds its shape and a nice design. However, it is not soft, meaning, I don't feel like I am being cushioned. The butt doesn't hurt when sitting on it, and maybe it conforms to shape, but doesn't seem to "give" when sitting on it. Definitely it gives me support, and provides a good lift which is one reason I bought it - to raise me up higher in the chair. For that it is excellent. Would I purchase it again - maybe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible Pain Relief for Wheelchair Patient
reviews.reviewText: I have a seriously ill lady, with many major problems. She's been in hospitals now for several months, and has become extremely deconditioned. To get back and forth to doctors, when she's out of the hospital, we use a medical transport system. It's an important service, but there's often a wait of at least an hour. KF, as I'll call her, has no body muscle, no subcutaneous fat, and no padding at all. She has to sit in a wheelchair, waiting. Then there's the bumpy ride, then the doctor appointments, a ride back and so forth.This lady has so much pain in her tail-bone, it's excruciating. She's in tears after about 10 minutes, and can hardly bear it during one of the appointment days. It's terrible! Then there's wheeling to meals at the facility, PT and other sitting events. She can't stand up, and never gets a chance to build muscles before the next medical crisis.Why the long story? Because today, we gave this cushion a test run. KF was in the ICU for 4 days, and released for transport, scheduled at 1:30pm. They got her into the chair with the new cushion, using a power lift, at around 1:15pm. We sat for 1 hour and 10 minutes, before the transport showed up. I kept asking her, "How's your tail-bone?" "Fine!"The ride was about half an hour, then a bit of wait until she could be lifted out of the chair, back to bed. By the time I showed up, about 3 hours had passed and I didn't know what I'd find. Usually, she's in such pain she gets a Vicodin, and can hardly function for the rest of the day. Not this time!Using this cushion, KF was about as "normal" as she'd been prior to getting into the wheelchair! Unbelievable! No tail-bone problems, no muscle cramping, no leg pain, no shoulder pain, and no arm and elbow pain, from trying to constantly adjust in the chair. Since she can't move much, it's very hard for her to even squirm around at the moment, but she didn't have to!This is a superb pillow. We've had it only one day, but I can't believe how much we're pinning our hopes on something so basic. Back at the facility, I showed it to a guy who's lost a leg and had major cellulitis. His spine has degenerated to bone-on-bone, and he can barely sit in a wheel-chair for more than an hour. There's nothing he can do, but he's robust, has a solid body with a lot of padding, but has almost no spinal support whatsoever. He was astonished at how comfortable we was when we tried out the pillow.Fingers crossed, hoping it lasts. I've rarely seen something that provides so much relief in such a basic way.UPDATE: This is absolutely a lifesaver! Within 1 week of using the cushion, KF's tailbone was mostly healed. She can now sit for the many hours in waiting rooms, PT or other problems.TIP: If you're using this with incontinence situations, definitely by two! If there's an issue, the outer fabric covering is easy to wash. But the inner memory foam isn't so easy, and takes forever to dry. MAJOR TIP: You can take off the outer casing, then cover the foam cushion with a 13-gal trash bag. Replace the casing, and the plastic bag isn't noticeable at all when used for sitting. However, it prevents liquids from soaking into the foam. The cushion is so critical you'll want a backup while the outer casing for the soiled one is in the wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands down, this is the best cushion!!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently had a lumbar spinal fusion and have bought several different types of seat cushions. I also went to three different medical supply stores. I found a seat cushion that did a fairly good job, but then I found this one! They are so comfortable that I plan on buying several more so I have one in my car and craft room. The gel infused cushion has just the right amount of give, but still provides structure making you feel well secured. The coccyx cutout is the perfect size to keep pressure off you tailbone. I am not one to take the time to write reviews, but if you or someone you know has had back surgery, they need this cushion. It is extremely difficult to sit comfortably afterwards, often times you can only stand or lay down, but this cushion allows you sit and be pretty dang comfortable while doing so. I was also really happy to see that I could purchase it with my FSA card! Worth every penny and then some!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes 2-3 days to get used to..
reviews.reviewText: I have ongoing siatica of some sort. First 2 days using this I wasn't sold but by 3rd day I had noticeably less pain. I think it had to form to my tush first. It fits my butt perfectly not too big or small. Probably not one size gits all though. It's nice and wide but if your too wide this won't work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Confortable and supportive office chair seat cushion
reviews.reviewText: It's fantastic and it's ergonomic design provides excellent support, making king hours of sitting comfortable. It looks doable and really soft. Good investment

I injured my tailbone several years ago and my work chair was re-hashing the old pain I had. So I decided to buy this butt pillow and it has worked wonders. I'm writing this review a year after I purchased this product and I am currently sitting on it. Which means it's high quality, durable, and comfortable. Well worth your money. And I have no more tailbone pain at work :)
Produto muito bom, aliviou minhas dores.
When you sit down on it ,you don’t want to get up. We have two,we use them at the dinner table, very relaxing and the comfort is great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy cómodo, elimino mi dolor de cadera y ciática
reviews.reviewText: Lo uso en la silla de oficina y ahora me lo llevo al coche, voy a comprar otro para no estarlo moviendo, me ha resultado fantástico pues ya tendía un dolor de ciática por estar tanto tiempo sentado
